Method Detail

solveIntersectionSystem

public static Vector solveIntersectionSystem(Ray ray,
                                             Mesh.Triangle triangle)
Optimized method for computing the intersection of Triangle 'triangle' with a ray coming from vector 'from' with direction vector 'direction'.

intersects

public static Vector intersects(Ray ray,
                                Mesh.Triangle triangle,
                                double tolerance)
Logical wrapper around solveIntersectionSystem(), returns null when the Ray does not intersect with the triangle or beyond the Ray. The tolerance parameter exists to avoid self intersection.
